text: Razmik Amyan is a famous Armenian singer. In 2017 Amyan was awarded with the title of Honored Artist of Armenia upon the decree of the Armenian President Serzh Sargsyan. He was also named the singer of the year at the World Armenian Entertainment Awards in 2014 and at the Armenian Golden Star Awards in 2010. He performed in the Toronto A.C.C. Summerfest in 2017 alongside other notable Armenian singers. He has released numerous music videos including "Yeraguyn" in March 2012, the animated "Pstik Papan" (also in 2012), and "Karabakhe mern e" in May 2015. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" style="width:12em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:19em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| Live Concert in Yerevan | *Released: 23 August 2011 *Label: Karen Studio *Format: Digital download |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" ! scope="col" style="width:12em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:19em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| Vay Vay | *Released: 21 December 2012 *Label: Armin Movsisyan Production *Format: Digital download |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of collaborative albums ! scope="col" style="width:12em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:19em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| Qez Hamar (Live) | *Released: 6 January 2012 *Label: Karen Studio *Format: Digital download |} ===Singles=== ====As lead artist==== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of singles ! scope="col"| Title ! scope="col"| Year ! scope="col"| Album |- ! scope="row"| "I Love You" (ft.
